AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: Paved road with two lanes and no shoulder, where Agent Jorge Luis Trevino encountered the vehicles
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Agent Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol agent with experience in distinguishing local vehicles, including knowledge of common vehicle models used by oil companies
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.a United States District Court: Court responsible for interpreting testimony and evidence in the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ford Motor Company F-150s: Truck model commonly used by oil companies, often white, and distinguished from other vehicles like Dodge Rams
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ford Motor Company F-250s: Truck model used for various purposes, including by individuals and companies
